headline: Mar Vista Strategic Growth Strategy Sold Fortive Corporation (FTV) as it Failed to Deliver on Expectations
summary: Mar Vista Investment Partners, LLC, an investment management company, released the “Strategic Growth Strategy” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The U.S. stock market had another successful time in the third quarter of 2024, with the S&P 500® Index growing for the fourth consecutive quarter, which hasn’t happened […]
